Audio.Locality: Araripe National Forest, Crato, Cear√° State
Audio.Author: Dan Lane
Audio.Comments: Response to playback (several vocalizations) from a single individual about 7-10m up in 10m-canopy woodland on white sand. Tends to flit its wings when it hops, doing so with its tail braced on branch, far more like a foliage-gleaner than a true xenops.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:yes
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Zonotrichia capensis,Phaeomyias murina,Euphonia chlorotica,Trogon curucui,Turdus leucomelas
